title: Configure User-Agent to circumvent block?
body:
Today I noticed T4L is not working any more, the sign-in page in my company says "You cannot access this right now" and Microsoft's error code is 53003. It seems like there is a new policy preventing me from logging in.

After some research, I found out:

- Login via Browser (Vivaldi / Chrome / Firefox) does also not work.
- Browser in Windows (Vivaldi) works, strange...
- When I use Vivaldi on Linux and spoof my user agent as "Chrome 122 on Windows", it works (I am using a browser extension to do this).

Can we somehow spoof the User Agent in teams-for-linux or make this configurable in a future release?
IMHO the problem is my company not allowing some user agents...
